intro_text: The patrol finds an opening to what seems to be a new set of tunnels.
decline_text: The patrol decides not to check the tunnels. After all, who knows what might be hiding inside?
success_text: The tunnels must have been an abandoned lizard den! No one has been here in a while, this could be a good location to return to.
The tunnels prove to be a new entrance to a set of tunnels c_n already uses. This could be helpful in the future.

s_c stops the patrol before they can move to enter the tunnels. After a careful inspection of the entrance, s_c concludes that a pink lizard has claimed this as its home. The predator seems to be away for the moment, but could return soon. The patrol quickly moves on.

s_c stops the patrol before they can move to enter the tunnels. After a careful inspection of the entrance, s_c concludes that a magenta lizard has claimed this as its home. The predator seems to be away for the moment, but could return soon. The patrol quickly moves on.
fail_text: Whoops! It seems a green lizard was calling this home. The patrol backs out of the tunnels and thankfully the lizard doesn't follow, just as surprised as they were.

s_c rushes into the tunnels with a gleeful meow! A new place to explore and discover! They're brought up short when the tunnel abruptly ends. It seems this tunnel leads to nothing but a dead end only a few lizard-lengths from the entrance.

It seems this hole is home to a cranky red lizard, a fact that the patrol learns very quickly when p_l, who was leading the group, cries out in pain. The cats back out of the tunnel quickly, but not quickly enough to save their Clanmate.
The tunnels prove to be a currently in-use pink lizard den. The patrol quickly retreats, but not before r_c gains a nasty wound.

history_text.scar: r_c was injured after disturbing a lizard in its den.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed after an unfortunate meeting with a pink lizard.
history_text.lead_death: were killed by a predator hiding in its den

intro_text: The patrol finds an opening to what seems to be a new set of tunnels.
decline_text: The patrol decides not to check the tunnels. After all, who knows what might be hiding inside?.
success_text: The tunnels must have been an abandoned lizard den! No one has been here in a while, this could be a good location to return to.
The tunnels prove to be a new entrance to a set of tunnels c_n already uses. This could be helpful in the future.

s_c pauses before entering the tunnels. After a careful inspection of the entrance, s_c concludes that a pink lizard has claimed this as its home. The predator seems to be away for the moment, but could return soon. The patrol quickly moves on.

s_c pauses before entering the tunnels. After a careful inspection of the entrance, s_c concludes that a magenta lizard has claimed this as its home. The predator seems to be away for the moment, but could return soon. The patrol quickly moves on.
fail_text: Whoops! It seems a green lizard was calling this home. The patrol backs out of the tunnels and thankfully the lizard doesn't follow, just as surprised as they were.

s_c rushes into the tunnels with a gleeful meow! A new place to explore and discover! They're brought up short when the tunnel abruptly ends. It seems this tunnel leads to nothing but a dead end only a few lizard-lengths from the entrance.
It seems this hole is home to a cranky red lizard, a fact that the patrol learns very quickly when r_c is snagged by the jaws of the predator. r_c won't be making it back to camp. . .
The tunnels prove to be a currently in-use pink lizard den. The patrol quickly retreats, but not before r_c gains a nasty wound.

history_text.scar: r_c was injured after disturbing a pink lizard in its den.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed after an unfortunate meeting with a red lizard.
history_text.lead_death: were killed by a predator hiding in its den

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a pack of yellow lizards burst from the long grass! An ambush!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders left open for the lizards to muddy.
success_text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, eventually driving the yellow lizards away.

s_c immediately leaps to protect their Clanmates, their ferocity in battle quickly terrifying the lizards. Realizing that they've sorely underestimated the Clan slugcats, the yellow lizards turn tail and run.
s_c revels in the battle, leaping into the fray with their teeth bared and claws ready. The yellow lizards are quickly driven away by the patrol.
fail_text: The yellow lizards are terrifyingly coordinated and are quick to use the patrol's shock and confusion against them. The patrol slugcats are picked off one by one, only a couple managing to escape the slaughter.
Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The yellow lizards are quick to take advantage of the confusion and eventually the patrol retreats, r_c badly wounded.

history_text.scar: r_c was badly scarred when yellow lizards ambushed their patrol.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed when yellow lizards ambushed their patrol.
history_text.lead_death: were killed in a yellow lizard ambush

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a pack of yellow lizards burst from the long grass! An ambush!
decline_text: r_c turns tail and races away! The lizards have them far outnumbered, warning the Clan is more important than dying needlessly.
success_text: Stunned for a moment, r_c is nearly caught in the teeth of the first yellow lizard, but they manage to dodge and weave through the onslaught of attacks, eventually escaping the fray and pelting towards camp with yowls of warning bursting from their lungs.

s_c snarls at the yellow lizards, outnumbered but not cowed. They throw themselves at the intruders with such ferocity and fury that the lizards are taken aback. Alarmed by the lack of fear and self-preservation from the Clan slugcat, the lizards freeze. s_c sees their opportunity to run and takes it, racing back to the camp to gather more warriors and return.
fail_text: s_c snarls at the yellow lizards, outnumbered but not cowed. They throw themselves at the intruders with such ferocity and fury that the lizards are taken aback. For a moment the lizards are stunned by the reaction, but the shock doesn't last long before they descend upon the warrior once more. Eventually, s_c has no choice but to escape before they're killed.
The yellow lizards greatly outnumber r_c and have no trouble killing the lone slugcat. Their body is discovered the next day, covered in wounds and cold.

history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed when yellow lizards ambushed them while on a solo patrol.
history_text.lead_death: were killed in a yellow lizard ambush

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of scavengers stride out of the long grass to confront the Clan slugcats!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders left open for the scavengers to muddy.
success_text: The scavengers posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan slugcats are strong, however, and the scavengers seem to be weakened by hunger. The patrol easily drives the intruders away.
The scavengers posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan slugcats are strong, however, and after a short fight, the scavengers are forced to retreat.

s_c takes the lead, confronting the gang with confidence. Eventually the scavengers admit that they've been struggling to find enough prey and were looking to steal richer territory from the Clan. Tensions are eased when s_c informs the scavengers of a prey-rich forest outside of c_n territory.

s_c takes the lead, confronting the gang with confidence. Eventually the scavengers admit that they've been struggling to find enough prey and were looking to steal richer territory from the Clan. Tensions are eased when s_c informs the scavengers of a prey-rich forest outside of c_n territory.
fail_text: The scavengers are terrifyingly coordinated and are quick to use the patrol's momentary surprise to their advantage. The patrol slugcats are picked off one by one, only a couple managing to escape the slaughter.
The scavengers posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. They prove to be strong fighters and eventually the patrol is forced to retreat, r_c badly injured.
antagonize_text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, eventually driving the scavengers away.
antagonize_fail_text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, but the scavengers are stronger than expected and eventually the patrol is forced to retreat.

history_text.scar: r_c was badly scarred when scavengers attacked their patrol.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed when scavengers attacked their patrol.
history_text.lead_death: were killed in a scavenger attack

intro_text: While on patrol, r_c notices some suspicious pawprints in the mud by the short grass.
success_text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. r_c quickly hides themselves in the long grass and sets up an ambush that sends the lizard fleeing off c_n territory.
r_c soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat.
The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. s_c throws themselves at the lizard, hissing furiously, and drives them off c_n territory.

Boldy, s_c follows the pawprints to a trespassing caramel lizard, and confronts it. Fur puffed up and scowling, they posture threateningly at the lizard  to get it to leave c_n territory. Intimidated by their confidence, the caramel lizard gives in and leaves without a fight.
fail_text: It turns out they were r_c's own pawprints... r_c huffs with embarrassment, suddenly grateful they're alone.

The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. s_c tries to set up a trap by using grass to cover an abandoned squidcada burrow, but they aren't as smart as they think they are. The trap fails, and the lizard wanders on.
Nose to the ground following the trail, r_c doesn't see the blow that kills them.
Nose to the ground following the trail, r_c doesn't see the blow coming. They haul themselves to their feet, spitting with outrage, but the caramel lizard that did it has already turned and run.

history_text.scar: r_c was scarred by an invading caramel lizard.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was killed by an invading caramel lizard.
history_text.lead_death: were killed by an invading caramel lizard

intro_text: While on patrol, r_c notices some suspicious pawprints in the mud by the short grass.
success_text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. r_c quickly hides themselves in the long grass and sets up an ambush that sends the lizard fleeing off c_n territory.
r_c soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat.

The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. s_c sets up a trap by using grass to cover an abandoned squidcada burrow. It sends the startled intruder yowling as it first falls, then flees c_n territory.

Boldy, s_c follows the pawprints to a trespassing caramel lizard, and confronts it. Fur puffed up and scowling, they posture threateningly at the lizard to get it to leave c_n territory. Intimidated by their confidence, the lizard gives in and leaves without a fight.
fail_text: It turns out they were r_c's own pawprints... r_c huffs with embarrassment, suddenly grateful they're alone.

The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. s_c throws themselves at the lizard, hissing furiously, but this is one battle hardened trespasser, and s_c isn't as good of a fighter as they'd like to think. The lizard manages to escape their grasp and run off further into c_n territory.
Nose to the ground following the trail, r_c doesn't see the blow that kills them.
Nose to the ground following the trail, r_c doesn't see the blow coming. They haul themselves to their feet, spitting with outrage, but the caramel lizard that did it has already turned and run.

history_text.scar: r_c was scarred by an invading caramel lizard.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was killed by an invading caramel lizard.
history_text.lead_death: were killed by an invading caramel lizard

intro_text: While on patrol, app1 notices some suspicious pawprints in the mud by the short grass.
success_text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. app1 quickly hides themselves in the long grass, and sets up an ambush that lets them pretend to be a far bigger and more impressive fighter, sending the lizard fleeing off c_n territory.

app1 soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat. In fact. . . they're pretty sure this is their mentor's scent. And their mentor has been hinting there'll be a test soon.
fail_text: It turns out they were app1's own pawprints... app1 huffs with embarrassment, suddenly grateful they're alone. They don't want to look dumb in front of other slugcats.

Boldy, s_c follows the pawprints to a trespassing caramel lizard, and confronts them. Fur puffed up and scowling, they posture threateningly at the lizard to get it to leave c_n territory. The lizard is not impressed by this teenager, and ignores them completely.
Nose to the ground following the trail, app1 doesn't see the blow that kills them.
Nose to the ground following the trail, app1 doesn't see the blow coming. They haul themselves to their feet, squealing with pain, and run for home.

history_text.scar: r_c was scarred by an invading caramel lizard.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was killed by an invading caramel lizard.
history_text.lead_death: were killed by an invading caramel lizard

success_text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. The patrol quickly hides themselves in the long grass and sets up an ambush, sending the lizard fleeing off c_n territory.
r_c soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat.
The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. s_c throws themselves at the lizard, hissing furiously, and together with r_c drives it off c_n territory.

Boldy, s_c follows the pawprints to a trespassing caramel lizard, and confronts it. Fur puffed up and scowling, s_c and r_c posture threateningly at the lizard to get it to leave c_n territory. Intimidated by their confidence, the rogue gives in and leaves without a fight.
fail_text: It turns out they were r_c's own pawprints... r_c huffs with embarrassment, suddenly grateful that their patrol is so small. Less eyes watching that embarrassing moment.

The pawprints lead to a trespassing caramel lizard. s_c tries to set up a trap by using grass to cover an abandoned squidcada burrow, but they aren't as smart as they think they are. The trap fails, and the lizard wanders on.

Nose to the ground following the trail, r_c doesn't see the blow coming. They haul themselves to their feet, spitting with outrage, but the caramel lizard that did it has already turned and run from the patrol.

history_text.scar: r_c was scarred by an invading caramel lizard.

r_c soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat.

fail_text: It turns out they were r_c's own pawprints... r_c huffs with embarrassment, and can't meet the eyes of the rest of the patrol.

intro_text: On their way to mark the far corners of their plains, r_c starts telling a story of their ancestors to keep every slugcat entertained.
decline_text: r_c nearly trips into a squidcada burrow, and decides to watch where their paws are going instead.
success_text: It keeps the slugcats' minds off the distance they have to cover. The patrol goes quickly and easily.

s_c spins a story, vivid and engaging, telling the tale of a massive war their ancestors fought over the border the patrol is headed to mark. Not only does it keep every slugcat entertained, it really emphasizes the importance of the patrol and motivates everyone.
It's a fantastic idea, making the patrol fly by as slugcats chat and laugh with their Clanmates, and everyone ends the day feeling much closer to each other.
fail_text: They try, but their Clanmates seem unenthused, so r_c stops.
s_c takes r_c aside, and reminds them coldly to focus on their duties.
